page.title: 11 ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content: MR ALAN ANDREW Mr Andrew lives in Bury Road. He works for a printing firm, but his hobby is painting.He is a very good artist and I like his work very much. He doesn't do portraits. His pictures are of the countryside, villages, and old buildings such as Edington church. We also have a painting of his of our school hanging in the school cloakroom. Mr Andrew said firstly a painting needs to be drawn well. He uses water colours mostly. Much of his work goes on exhibition, where he sells. He started when he was about sixteen. He is the only artist in his family ,and he would very much like to earn his living from painting and drawing.
